# [Interview #971: AMOL Signing Report - Terez, Entry #22](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=971#22)

#### Terez

Do you know about how many Aes Sedai are left after the Last Battle?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Um, Harriet said "many".

#### Terez

*Many*
? (laughs) Yeah...

#### Brandon Sanderson

(laughs, coughs) Boy they lost a
*lot*
.
